title.rendered: Amazon Customer Experience with Greg Reynolds of Zonsupport

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:30 — 31.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:30 — 31.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Greg Reynolds is the founder and CEO of ZonSupport, they are customer care experts for Amazon.

Greg was originally from New Zealand but is currently in Thailand as a digital nomad.

He is going to talk to us about why we need to outsource customer service and many more!

Check them out here:

https://amazingfba.com/zonsupport

 

You’ll Learn:

  • At what stage you need to be getting help
  • How to use customer service as a learning tool
  • How to be prepared for problems using email templates
  • The mindset issues that hurt our business
  • How to win a 5-star review without a problem
